title: Keycloak - User Events
description: - This dashboard provides insight into the overview of user events generated by Keycloak.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides insights into events performed by users. This includes events such as successful user login, a user entering an incorrect password, or a user account updating.

For more information, see the [Keycloak Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/keycloak/).

Tips:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.content: Login events includes following type of events: Login, Register, Logout, Code to Token and Refresh Token events and ERROR events for the same.

search.query: source:keycloak service:user-event @type:(LOGIN OR LOGIN_ERROR OR LOGOUT OR LOGOUT_ERROR OR REFRESH_TOKEN OR REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR OR CODE_TO_TOKEN OR CODE_TO_TOKEN_ERROR OR REGISTER OR REGISTER_ERROR) $Realm_Name $Client_Id $Client_IP $User_Name $Type $Host_Name
